choices: Freddy comes up with a plan...
1.content:
“Foxy! Relax! Reset the controls! Chica, manually reset the landing gear!”

Bonnie rushes in from his Mechanic’s station. “Our engines are gonna blow!!!”
1.title: What does Captain Do?

info.brief_description: What if the FNAF in space was treated like a real space drama?
